about_the_game:
Rituality is an accursed dungeon crawler combining elements from party-based RPGs, roguelike ARPG combat and Immersive Sim interactivity. Use the mysterious power of the Evermend Lantern, gather your party and traverse the dungeon isles to cleanse and banish its cursed inhabitants.

We know no gods... Only myths.
Spirits whisper, folklore lurk in the shadows and the weak are possessed. Medicinal and ritual practice are one in the same, those devoted to contacting, harnessing and banishing the damned are known as Ritualists.




Real-time CRPG Combat
Command your party in real-time combat, gain the advantage with Focus Mode to slow and stop time. Choose between 5+ unique classes to make up your party bringing their own unique advantages and disadvantages, though be cautious as each expedition brings new challenges and those who fall in battle will be permanently removed from the party.

Experiment with your environment
Everything is a weapon, all items can be equipped and have unique traits and actions.
Your party can grab, throw, carry and destroy many things. Out of ranged options? Why not throw a barrel at the enemies!
Use the campfire to burn down objects in the world. Maybe cook up a meal for the party or burn down a locked door that was too close to the fire!




Discover Powerful Curses
Absorb cursed essence into your Evermend Lantern, the lantern shatters when filled condensing the essence into unique effects which can be engraved into your party and items. This power comes at a price, curse sickness. If not kept in check, it will lead to madness.

Build up your town
Claim the last sanctuary on the dungeon isle as your own, rebuild, recruit and expand your town.
Investigate Qurios within the dungeon and uncover their secrets to further your sanctuary through use of the dark arts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I3 2100 / AMD A8 6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements may change during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements may change during development.

short_description: Rituality is an accursed real-time tactics dungeon crawler. Recruit, equip and command your party of Ritualists to cleanse the dungeon isles' cursed inhabitants. The dungeon's curses awaken mysterious abilities within your party. Harness this power or succumb to the madness...
